ModOptionsBusstopDesertCost: Minutes the bus takes between Bus Stop and Calico Desert
ModOptionsBusstopMineCost: Minutes the mine cart takes between Bus Stop and Mines
ModOptionsMineQuarryCost: Minutes the mine cart takes between Mines and Quarry
ModOptionsQuarryTownCost: Minutes the mine cart takes between Quarry and Town
ModOptionsReset: Reset all settings back to default values
